name: Grabitoons!
description:
Compete in this galactic test of skill with your own customizable Grabitoon!


Get ready to rumble!



An Experience for Everyone!

Bring your friends and smack 'em over the head in this physics-based party game for up to four players!

From kids to grandpas, Grabitoons! is a game everybody can enjoy. Easy to pick up with a streamlined control scheme, and accessible for all!

Play with your partner in 1 vs 1 scenarios, pity your kids amongst each other, or gather the whole family for an all-out Grabitoons! experience!



Grab, throw, smack and wack your way through more than 15 different mini-games, conquer the different variants and unlock new pieces to build your own Grabitoon!
